data.title: Intuit Office Locations and Headquarters: Mountain View, CA
data.meta_description: Intuit Headquarters and Locations - Learn more about Intuit's locations by map by and/or jobs.
data.text:
Zippia gives an in-depth look into the details of Intuit, including salaries, political affiliations, employee data, and more, in order to inform job seekers about Intuit. The employee data is based on information from people who have self-reported their past or current employments at Intuit. The data on this page is also based on data sources collected from public and open data sources on the Internet and other locations, as well as proprietary data we licensed from other companies. Sources of data may include, but are not limited to, the BLS, company filings, estimates based on those filings, H1B filings, and other public and private datasets. While we have made attempts to ensure that the information displayed are correct, Zippia is not responsible for any errors or omissions or for the results obtained from the use of this information. None of the information on this page has been provided or approved by Intuit. The data presented on this page does not represent the view of Intuit and its employees or that of Zippia.

Intuit may also be known as or be related to INTUIT INC, Intuit, Intuit Inc and Intuit Inc.
